attributes.action: Reinstate Foreign Office Minister Mark Fields from his undue suspension.
attributes.additional_details: Bankers and politicians had gathered at the City of London event on Thursday night to hear speeches by Chancellor Philip Hammond and the Bank of England's governor Mark Carney. In light of the current political and social climate, with assaults and even 'jokes' that acid should be thrown, we feel Minister Field's decisive action was entirely appropriate.
attributes.background: Reinstate Foreign Office Minister Mark Fields from his undue suspension, following his physical removal of an intruder activist into a private event at London's Mansion House.
